about_the_game:
Story

Confluence (noun): a coming or flowing together, meeting, or gathering at one point; the joining of two rivers.

In the epilogue of his happy ending, Hugo waxes poetic on the scale of his life and love and how, wondrously, the littlest of things can also be the most precious.

About

A short kinetic novel spin-off from Forsythia Productions' Of Sense and Soul, a Queer Victorian Romance Visual Novel. 

Confluence was created during the O2A2 (Only One of Any Asset) VN Game Jam: Queer Edition 2023 .

Features

  • An emotional reflection on personal growth through love and change.

  • 8-15 minutes of playtime

  • Full voice acting

  • One sprite, one soundtrack, and one background

  • Dynamic cinematography and effects

  • Gay thoughts 🌈 💭✨

  • English with Japanese Localisation

Content & Spoiler Warnings

Confluence  takes place after the events of  Of Sense and Soul , and contains vague references to the best ending in which Hugo and Seamus are in a relationship. 

No OSAS plot events are detailed in Confluence, and you can still enjoy this without knowing the main story.

  • Rated G. 

  • Motion: Animations for a rotating background and cinematography are used.

  • References The Ugly Duckling by Hans Christian Andersen. 

  • Major themes include queer belonging, change, personal growth, and hope.
